metrics.name: redis_used_memory
metrics.description: This metric indicates the memory used by the Redis allocator.

metrics.name: redis_mem_fragmentation_ratio
metrics.description: This metric indicates the memory currently used by Redis.

metrics.name: redis_instantaneous_ops_per_sec
metrics.description: This metric indicates the memory actually allocated by the Redis allocator.

metrics.name: redis_keyspace_hits
metrics.description: This metric indicates the memory fragmentation of the Redis allocator.

metrics.name: redis_keyspace_misses
metrics.description: This metric indicates the memory fragmentation ratio of the Redis allocator.

metrics.name: redis_clients
metrics.description: This metric indicates the physical memory (RSS) currently used by Redis.

metrics.name: redis_used_cpu_sys
metrics.description: This metric indicates the uptime of the Redis instance.

metrics.name: redis_evicted_keys
metrics.description: This metric indicates the total number of commands processed by Redis.

metrics.name: redis_connected_slaves
metrics.description: This metric indicates the total number of connections received by Redis.

metrics.name: redis_rdb_last_save_time_elapsed
metrics.description: This metric indicates the number of calls made to different Redis commands.

metrics.name: redis_rejected_connections
metrics.description: This metric indicates the total execution time of Redis commands.
